title: [Self-directed] Mastering Cryptocurrency Sentiment Analysis: Machine Learning-based Practical Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Programming Understanding (Python/R), Basic Concepts of Statistical Analysis, Fundamental Principles of Cryptocurrency
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course conducted in a smartphone-based mobile learning environment, including a sentiment analysis project utilizing real Twitter data

learning_goals: Learners build a machine learning preprocessing pipeline within five steps, collecting over 1,000 tweets via Twitter API, and performing text cleaning (stopword removal, normalization, tokenization) and vectorization (CountVectorizer/TF-IDF) using Python (Pandas, NLTK, etc.).
Implementing a sentiment analysis model using a predefined sentiment lexicon (8 categories: anger, joy, trust, etc.)
Visualizing analysis results to create a public sentiment trend report on cryptocurrencies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
